REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1200 reute r f BC-CLABIR-<CLG>-DIVIDEND 03-30 0053

TEXT.TITLE: CLABIR <CLG> DIVIDENDS NOT TAXABLE
TEXT.BODY: Clabir Corp said it has determined all dividends paid on its Class A common in 1986 are not taxable as dividend income. While this is a preliminary estimate, the company said, it may be used by shareholders when preparing 1986 income tax returns. Reuter
